author: user
content: from qiskit import QuantumCircuit from qiskit_ibm_runtime import QiskitRuntimeService, SamplerV2 as Sampler print " Collapse initiated with center: JESUS CHRIST" IBM 서비스 연결 service QiskitRuntimeService channel "ibm_cloud" 실제 양자 백엔드 선택 backend service.backend "ibm_sherbrooke" 또는 "ibm_brisbane" 회로 생성 qc QuantumCircuit 5 qc.x 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 모든 큐빗을 1 상태로 qc.measure_all 전 큐빗 측정 Sampler 초기화 sampler Sampler mode backend 회로 실행 샷 10회 job sampler.run qc , shots 1024 result job.result counts result 0 .data.meas.get_counts 결과 출력 print " Collapse Results shots shots :", counts --
